amendment.description: An amendment numbered 16 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to increase by $1,000,000 and decrease by $1,000,000 the Global Health Programs account to highlight and support the fight against the practice of Female Genital Mutilation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
